debrief.Hypothesis: What are the most important parameters for people to identify a country even in unknown areas? How bad my memory is and I have to re-click the same hint because I forgot the answer :-) ?
debrief.DiagnosticApproach: I give more weight to the things I'm more confident with (animals / food exported in this case), and little to none to things I don't even know like the various economic indexes.
